===Etymology===
''[[xiehouyu|Xiehouyu]]''.

Short for {{zh-m|柴可夫斯基|[[Tchaikovsky]]|tr=caai4 ho2 fu1 si1 gei1}}, using the first three syllables to hint at the last two, {{m|zh||斯基|tr=si1 gei1}}, a homophone of {{zh-m|司機|si1 gei1|driver}}.
